description: `registerOrganization` function implementation depends on the finalized design and API contract.
mitigation_plan: Ensure design review is completed early in the sprint.

description: Implementation of `firestore.rules` depends on the approved security design and access matrix.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks implementation of the entire platform security model.

description: Automated testing of security rules requires the initial implementation of the ruleset.
mitigation_plan: Develop tests in parallel with implementation.
impact_if_delayed: Delays validation of the core security model.

description: Rigorous integration testing of the tenant purge function is required after its implementation due to the high risk of the operation.
mitigation_plan: Allocate dedicated time and resources for thorough testing in an isolated environment.
impact_if_delayed: Prevents the safe deployment of the tenant data purge feature.
